headline: Autodesk (NasdaqGS:ADSK) Signs Cooperation Deal With Starboard & Launches Cloud Integration
summary: Autodesk (NasdaqGS:ADSK) recently entered into a cooperation agreement with Starboard Value LP, which may contribute positively to the company's governance by appointing Jeff Epstein and Anna Christine Simons as new directors post the 2025 Annual Meeting. Concurrently, Clearstory's integration with Autodesk Construction Cloud was announced, enhancing capabilities for contractors. Over the past week, Autodesk's stock saw a 4.7% increase, closely aligned with broader market trends, which also...

headline: Winners And Losers Of Q4: Cadence (NASDAQ:CDNS) Vs The Rest Of The Design Software Stocks
summary: Quarterly earnings results are a good time to check in on a company’s progress, especially compared to its peers in the same sector. Today we are looking at Cadence (NASDAQ:CDNS) and the best and worst performers in the design software industry.
